text_trans: A large number of dead fish washed up on the coast of northern Japan, and fishermen in Hokkaido went to pick up edible dead fish. Japanese media claimed that changes in temperature caused sardines and mackerel to rise into the sky in flakes, and some Japanese citizens questioned that there was a problem with the seawater in the offshore waters." #A large number of sardine carcasses found on a coast of Japan#"
